content: nyrikki is the finnish deity of the hunt and cattle and son of tapio and mielikki worked in 1 x 1 ribbing with smooth well-planned decreases two options to the crown this tubular cast-on hat is very stretchy and flexible thus will be comfortable for all occasions in regulation blaze orange it makes a great gift for the hunter in your life of course it can be knit in whatever color you desire **sizes & materials** xs s m l xl worsted-weight or aran-weight which proceeds from xs as s s as m and so on in other words for cast on of 80 sts makes an xs in worsted and a s in aran-weight **fits ** 18 20-21 21-22 22-23 23-25 / 47 5cm 50-52 5cm 52 5-55cm 55-57 5cm 57 5-60cm heads **worsted-weight yarn ** bernat super value #4 440 yds / 402m per 7 oz / 197 g carrot 120 130 140 150 160 yds / 108 118 126 138 148 m **gauge ** 1x1 rib 22-24 sts / 4 / 10cm and 28 row unstretched **needles/hook ** us 7 / 4 5mm 16-20 / 40-50cm circular and dpns or small circumference method of choice us i or j / 5 0 to 5 5mm hook us 8-9 / 5 0-5 5mm straight **aran-weight yarn ** red heart premier 4-ply acrylic 256 orange blaze **gauge ** in 1 x 1 rib 20 sts / 4 / 10cm and 24-26 row unstretched **needles/hook ** us 8 / 5 0 16-20 / 40-50cm circular and dpns or small circ method of choice us i / 5mm hook us 9-10 / 5 5-6 0mm straight yarn needle stitch marker
